content:
Go ahead and spend time with your friends,
I'll handle the Omni-Gallery organization
and the display of your various collections!

Just do what you think is best!
I'm sure your friend will be delighted.

Would you like to give them a tour,
and properly introduce the remarkable features of this place?

I would also love to have an in-depth discussion about our jellyfish, sea urchin, koi, Asian Swamp Eel, bay salmon, true lobster, ground beetle, dung beetle...{短暂停}
My apologies, I got carried away again.

Ah, <color=#d3b037>{me}</color> here.
I just happened to see your friend passing by,
They seemed quite fascinated by our unique ecosystem here.

<color=#d3b037>{me}</color>,
While I was observing the movement patterns of the ground beetle,
I also noticed your friend's movement patt...{短暂停}presence.
